description:
Welcome to my home, located in beautiful Brooklyn Heights.
My studio apartment is cozy, has lots of natural lighting, and is on a very quiet street.
The Brooklyn Promenade, Brooklyn Bridge, Brooklyn Bridge Park, Trader Joes, Boerum Hill, Cobble Hill, and Carroll Gardens are all nearby. There are tons of restaurants, bars, and shopping options in the neighborhood.
Nearly every train line in the city within a five minute walk. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: Cozy Brooklyn Heights Studio
review: The host canceled this reservation 17 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
